name: Ducking the Cheese
description: Here you will play as a swan named Robin. You are in possession of a rare and IMMENSELY delicious piece of cheese! The ducks in the park you frequent are simply pecking at your heels trying to take it from you, and if you fly away then the cheese will fall out of your wings. To escape the clutches of the demented ducks you must follow the mazes that lead out of the park!
